name: The Only Way is Down (tompudding)
description:
It's some sort of apocalypse!

There are zombies!
You have to go down!
You are use the mouse and WASD and maybe number keys!

This game was made in 48 hours as part of Ludum Dare 29, where the theme was "Beneath the Surface"
